name: Dark Blastoise
author: Mitsuhiro Arita
flavor_text: An aggressive Pokémon that tackles anything it sees.

attacks.name: Hydrocannon
attacks.effect: Does 30 damage plus 20 more damage for each {W} Energy attached to Dark Blastoise but not used to pay for this attack’s Energy cost. You can’t add more than 40 damage in this way.

attacks.name: Rocket Tackle
attacks.effect: Dark Blastoise does 10 damage to itself. Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Dark Blastoise during your opponent’s next turn. (Any other effects of attacks still happen.)
